org.odk.collect.android.logic

Class ImmutableDisplayableQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odk.collect.android.logic.ImmutableDisplayableQuestion

  • public class ImmutableDisplayableQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents all the user-visible aspects of a question at a particular point in time. This information is generally accessed through FormEntryPrompts which change as the form is being filled and Triggerables are evaluated. ImmutableDisplayableQuestion objects are used to make snapshots of what the user sees. Inspired by https://github.com/dimagi/commcare-android/blob/fd63a5b2471a1e33ac6bf1ce77ac82daf558b08a/app/src/org/commcare/activities/components/FormRelevancyUpdating.java#L48

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImmutableDisplayableQuestion(org.javarosa.form.api.FormEntryPrompt question)
      Saves all the user-visible aspects of the given FormEntryPrompt.
